description:
Luffy and the Straw Hats find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of purple gas that turns everything living thing in its path into petrified statues of ash!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’arme la plus destructrice de l’histoire. Morte-terre !
Shijou Saiaku no Satsuriku Heiki! Shinokuni
The Deadliest Weapon of Mass Destruction in History! Shinokuni!
Самое гибельное оружие в истории! Шинокуни!
أكثر أسلحة الدمار الشامل فتكًا في التاريخ! شينوكوني!
史上最悪の殺戮兵器! シノクニ
